mail.description: This command is used to enable / disable economy mode

parameter.name: EnableEconomyMode
parameter.description: TRUE to set Economy mode. FALSE = disable

mail.description: This command replies to the API_ECONOMY_MODE_REQ
This command is used to enable / disable DECT 50 mW mode

parameter.name: Enable50mwMode
parameter.description: TRUE to set 50 mW mode. FALSE = disable

mail.description: This command replies to the API_FIFTY_MW_MODE_REQ

parameter.name: InsideCradle
parameter.description: TRUE if HS is placed inside the cradle
